message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the deal, but I'm only willing to pay $95 for it. What do you say?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  I'm still only comfortable paying $100.  If you're willing to accept that, we have a deal.
Bob, I understand you're close to your target price, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, so I'll sell it to you for $108.
